thread.title: Buy This House: An Oceanfront Resort in Thailand
thread.title_full: Buy This House: An Oceanfront Resort in Thailand | Maxim

author: By Gabriella Paiella
title: Buy This House: An Oceanfront Resort in Thailand
text:
Where Is It? Phuket, Thailand (it’s okay, we laughed too) — the go-to destination island for some of the best beaches in the world.
The House: This massive property, part of a private villa estate, retains traditional Southeast Asian design, artwork, and antiques. It’s both deeply luxurious and extremely calming.
The Selling Point: It’s far, far away. If you’re going to buy a vacation home, or just up and move somewhere new and exciting, might as well go all the way.
Buy The Numbers: 6 bedrooms, 9 bathrooms, 3 floors, 5,000 square feet, 1 spa with a steam room and sauna, 1 home theater, 1 private café, and 2 infinity pools. It’s listed as price upon request, so you know what that means. (It's probably very, very expensive.)
Where Can You Buy It? From Sotheby’s International Realty .
Not the house for you? Check out the rest of our featured luxury properties here .
